fields.label: translate:: Add a video
fields.description: translate:: Click below to add a video you wish to use in your interactive video. You can add a video link or upload video files. It is possible to add several versions of the video with different qualities. To ensure maximum support in browsers at least add a version in webm and mp4 formats.

fields.label: translate:: Start screen options (unsupported for YouTube videos)
translate:: The title of this interactive video
fields.description: translate:: Used in summaries, statistics etc.

fields.label: translate:: Hide title on video start screen
translate:: Short description (Optional)
fields.description: translate:: Optional. Display a short description text on the video start screen. Does not work for YouTube videos.

fields.label: translate:: Poster image
fields.description: translate:: Image displayed before the user launches the video. Does not work for YouTube Videos.

fields.label: translate:: Text tracks (unsupported for YouTube videos)
translate:: Track label
fields.description: translate:: Used if you offer multiple tracks and the user has to choose a track. For instance 'Spanish subtitles' could be the label of a Spanish subtitle track.

fields.label: translate:: Source language, must be defined for subtitles
fields.description: translate:: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If 'Subtitles' is the type of text track selected, the source language of the track must be defined.

fields.label: translate:: Default text track
fields.description: translate:: If left empty or not matching any of the text tracks the first text track will be used as the default.

fields.label: translate:: Display as
fields.description: translate:: Button is a collapsed interaction the user must press to open. Poster is an expanded interaction displayed directly on top of the video

fields.label: translate:: Turn into button on small screens
translate:: Label
fields.description: translate:: Label displayed next to interaction icon.

fields.label: translate:: Seek to
fields.description: translate:: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.label: translate:: Allow the user to opt out and continue
translate:: Seek to
fields.description: translate:: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.label: translate:: Allow the user to opt out and continue
translate:: Require full score for task before proceeding
fields.description: translate:: For best functionality this option should be used in conjunction with the "Prevent skipping forward in a video" option of Interactive Video.

fields.label: translate:: Box shadow
fields.description: translate:: Adds a subtle shadow around the interaction. You might want to disable this for completely transparent interactions

fields.label: translate:: Go To
fields.description: translate:: The target time the user will be taken to upon pressing the hotspot. Enter timecode in the format M:SS.

fields.label: translate:: Visualize
fields.description: translate:: Show that interaction can be clicked by adding a border and an icon

fields.label: translate:: Display at
fields.description: translate:: Number of seconds before the video ends.

fields.label: translate:: Start video at
fields.description: translate:: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.label: translate:: Auto-play video
fields.description: translate:: Start playing the video automatically

fields.label: translate:: Loop the video
fields.description: translate:: Check if video should run in a loop

fields.label: translate:: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: translate:: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: translate:: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: translate:: Start with bookmarks menu open
fields.description: translate:: This function is not available on iPad when using YouTube as video source.

fields.label: translate:: Show button for rewinding 10 seconds
translate:: Prevent skipping forward in a video
fields.description: translate:: Enabling this options will disable user video navigation through default controls.

fields.label: translate:: Deactivate sound
fields.description: translate:: Enabling this option will deactivate the video's sound and prevent it from being switched on.

fields.label: translate:: Default label for adaptivity seek button
translate:: Default label for continue video button
translate:: Warning that the user must answer the question correctly before continuing
fields.default: translate:: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.

fields.label: translate:: Text explaining that a single interaction with a name has come into view
translate:: Text for explaining that multiple interactions have come into view
translate:: Answered message (@answered will be replaced with the number of answered questions)
translate:: Submit screen title
fields.description: translate:: @answered will be replaced by the number of answered questions.

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen information
fields.default: translate:: You have answered @answered questions, click below to submit your answers.
fields.description: translate:: @answered will be replaced by the number of answered questions.

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen information for missing answers
fields.default: translate:: You have not answered any questions.

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen information for answer needed
fields.default: translate:: You have to answer at least one question before you can submit your answers.

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen submit message
fields.default: translate:: Your answers have been submitted!

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen table row title: Answered questions
translate:: Submit screen table row title: Score
translate:: Submit screen row summary including score (for readspeakers)
fields.default: translate:: You got @score out of @total points for the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.

fields.label: translate:: Submit screen row summary for no score (for readspeakers)
fields.default: translate:: You have answered the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.
